summary: Forgotten Magic Redone brings you some of the most comprehensive and intriguing spells for Skyrim to date! All new set of spells gain experience through use, and allow you to upgrade them in unique and exciting ways.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#C66E1C]Forgotten Magic Redone[/color] brings you some of the most comprehensive and intriguing spells for Skyrim to date! Following on from the [size=2][color=#C66E1C]Forgotten Magic[/color][/size] mod, the arcane arts have now been mastered.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1614960-1378571974.png[/img]
While other magic mods oftentimes introduce hundreds of different spells (which can be a bit overwhelming) this mod takes a different approach. Forgotten Magic Redone provides a smaller set of spells, that partially complement each other, and tries to keep them balanced and immersive.

What makes this mod special is that the spells you use will level up with you and enable you to unlock some of the mysteries hidden within their scripts, bestowing new effects upon them as they grow stronger and stronger.
Those who want to use as many different spells as possible can use this mod alongside other popular magic mods without any problems.

Forgotten Magic Redone goes a long way towards achieving true complementary spell casting, by giving you the opportunity to master a set of spells that will cover your style of play, in your schools of magic, while unleashing a wealth of combined effects that will dazzle even the Archmage.
[line]
[color=#C66E1C][font="Impact"][size=5]FEATURES[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[line]
[color=#C66E1C]Forgotten Magic Redone[/color] adds 39 new spells to your game, each with 10 possible improvements to the spell, 390 improvements in total. The level of the spells is capped at 5. Spells gain experience as you use them, which allows you to unlock a new effect each time they level up. These improvements, as well as the spells themselves can be combined for potentially greater effects; itâ€™s up to you to decide where your true power and nature lie.

In the MCM menu, under Forgotten Magic tab, you can view your spell experience, remaining points, and the talents available for that particular spell. Also, once you've used a spell enough for it to reach the next level, you will receive a small notification saying "Your spell has leveled up!" on the top left corner of your screen.

Spells gain experience each time you successfully cast them. For every level you gain within your spell, the required experience is increased by 1.5 (or by 2, for certain spells). Only the most dedicated will master their craft. The Dovahkiin possesses a certain advantage over the normal fair of mages and can spend a dragon soul to refund all talent points spent on a spell.
[line]
[center][color=#C66E1C][font="Impact"][size=5]REVIEW[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[line]
Thanks to Brodual and insane0hflex.
[center][youtube]MXpgjDtG_5g[/youtube][youtube]-92SXTGtnYA[/youtube][/center]
[line]
[center][color=#C66E1C][font="Impact"][size=5]WHAT ARE THE SPELLS?[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[line]
[color=#C66E1C]For more detailed description, see the Articles tab.[/color]

Mystic spells: Arcane Weapon, Cursed Rune, Discord, Phantom Shroud, Spectral Missiles, Phantom Armor
Paladin spells: Divine Light, Holy Bolt, Divine Armor, Hammer of Justice
Warlock spells: Blight Curse, Necrosis, Void Bolt, Summon Deathguard, Deathly Pall, Nether Rift
Pyromancer spells: Fire Blast, Conflagrate, Meteor Shower, Doppelganger, Salamander Touch, Phoenix Strike
Cryomancer spells: Ice Lance, Frost Bomb, Ancient Lich, Frost Armor, Winter Woe, Glacial Fortress
Druid spells: Healing Touch, Seed of Life, Earthbound Weapon, Wild Mushroom, Veil of Nature, Wolf Pack
Electromancer spells: Stormstrike, Lightning Strike, Storm Armor, Skyfall, Electric Charge

[color=red]IMPORTANT[/color]: The "Impact"-perk of the destruction-tree doesn't affect spells of this mod. This is intentional, because, quite frankly, the "Impact"-perk is overpowered.
[line]
[center][color=#C66E1C][font="Impact"][size=5]WHERE ARE THEY?[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[line]
Whenever you kill an enemy, there's a chance to find random spell book. A few of the easier spells can be purchased from a mage staying at the Bannered Mare in White Run; others can be bought from his associate wandering the roads between White Run and Markarth.
[line]
[center][color=#C66E1C][font="Impact"][size=5]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[line]
Should be compatible with everything. If you have found a mod that is not compatible, please let me know.
[line]
[center][color=#C66E1C][font="Impact"][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[line]
Bethesda
SkyUI Team
author: 3JIou and sward66

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-4-2
files.changelogHtml:
Added a level limit slider to the settings tab.

Changed the Nether Rift: Marrow Suffering effect to deal stamina and magicka damage, not health.

Corrected the description of Deathly Pall: Visions of Death

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-4-2 SkyRe Patch
files.fileName: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-4-2 SkyRe Patch-35339-1-4-2.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Added a level limit slider to the settings tab.

Changed the Nether Rift: Marrow Suffering effect to deal stamina and magicka damage, not health.

Corrected the description of Deathly Pall: Visions of Death

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-0
files.changelogHtml:
Significant changes to the loot system, so that spell books are more likely to show up on certain opponents than on others. The default drop rate for spell books has been cut to compensate.

* Spriggans and Hagravens: 5x chances of Druid spells
* Dwemer Centurions: 5x chances of Electromancer spells
* Daedra: 5x chances of ALL spells
* Vampires: 5x chances of Warlock spells
* Wisp Mothers: 5x chances of Arcane spells
* Dragon Priests: 5x chances of Paladin spells
* Fire Dragons: 5x chances of Pyromancer spells
* Frost Dragons: 5x chances of Cryomancer spells

Added a new wandering spell vendor, Lokun, who can commonly be found at caravan camps at Whiterun or Markarth, or wandering in between. He sells a handful of randomly selected leveled spells. Between the new vendor and the changes to the loot system, it is easier to steer your character development in the direction you wish to go, but chance still plays a role.

New spells:

Winter Woe: Destruction Expert, a weaker version of Blizzard but with a range of useful upgrades.

Glacial Fortress: Alteration Expert (lesser power); turns the caster into a block of invulnerable (and immobile) ice for 10 sec., to allow a break from combat while slow-acting spells or conjured creatures have a chance to wear down your opponents.

Bug Fixes:

* Salamander Touch: Ignition no longer triggered by projectiles.
* Salamander Touch now has a sound effect to indicate when it wears off.
* Soul Reaper is no longer triggered by Bond of Corruption's secondary curse.
* Changed Earthbound Weapon: Poison Bite to stack on repeated hits, like ordinary poison.
* Made another attempt at fixing an intermittent bug with Wolf Pack not shutting down cleanly.

Balance Fixes:

* Reduced destruction experience from Arcane Weapon: Bloodthirst
* Reduced damage from Veil of Nature: Poison Sting to 10-30, depending on spell levels, and fixed script checks to match the description (targets with zero resistance, after buffs, will no longer be damaged - e.g. wood elves). This cloak spell still does substantially more damage, over a wider area, than any other in the game - but fewer targets are vulnerable to it now.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-1
files.changelogHtml:
Several bug fixes:

* Fixed default drop rates for balance (4% for tomes, 3% for jewelry)
* Fixed some bugs that could occur if spell level was greater than 5.
* Fixed Wolf Pack to work with Summoner perk.
* Fixed Cursed Rune to not trigger for followers.
* Fixed broken tracking toggle in MCM for Glacial Fortress.
* Added missing update to loot script.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-1 SkyRe Patch
files.fileName: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-1 SkyRe Patch-35339-1-5-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Several bug fixes:

* Fixed default drop rates for balance (4% for tomes, 3% for jewelry)
* Fixed some bugs that could occur if spell level was greater than 5.
* Fixed Wolf Pack to work with Summoner perk.
* Fixed Cursed Rune to not trigger for followers.
* Fixed broken tracking toggle in MCM for Glacial Fortress.
* Added missing update to loot script.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-2
files.changelogHtml:
Several fixes for game balance and ease of use:

* Arcane Weapon: added an MCM hotkey for swapping weapons.
* Ancient Lich: spell damage increased 25% for balance.
* Necrosis: Bane does additional damage of 3% of total magicka per tick.
* Doppelganger: Reduced chances of target attacking double. Cauterize upgrade modified.
* Divine Armor: Redemption damage increased to 4-8% of base health, depending on spell level.
* Phoenix Strike: cooldown bug fixed, cooldown increased to 30 sec. (20 sec. with Burning Fury).

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-2 SkyRe Patch
files.fileName: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-2 SkyRe Patch-35339-1-5-2.7z
files.changelogHtml:

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-3
files.changelogHtml:
Added three new spells by 3jiou, two in Mystic and one in Electromancer:

* Phantom Armor
* Spectral Missile
* Electric Charge

Also changed Cursed Rune upgrade Exhaustion to Mirror Curse (casts Doppelganger on the target).

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-3 SkyRe Patch
files.fileName: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-3 SkyRe Patch-35339-1-5-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Several bug fixes, including:

* Tweaked inventory list for wandering vendor (Lokun).
* Increased Frost Armor rating at the 2nd and 3rd rank of Mage Armor, to match the perk description.
* Removed incorrect 'Hide in UI' flag from Mystic version of Hammer of Justice.
* Fixed stuck sound effect after casting Spectral Missiles.
* Fixed bug with Deathguard: Dark Growth getting 'stuck' on the character (hopefully).
* Reduced Seed of Life: Phytogenesis effect from 100% to 50%, for balance.
* Fixed grey face bug on vendors (hopefully).

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-4
files.changelogHtml:
Fixes for several spells, including:

* Fixed a bug in Phantom Armor, not refreshing health info after a hit.
* Fixed the level-up message for Phantom Armor.
* Increased Phantom Armor: Arcane Mending to 4-6% of total health, for balance.
* Fixed Electric Charge and Nether Rift to no longer gain experience casting on corpses.
* Shortened casting time for Spectral Missiles from 1.0 to 0.5 sec.
* Made Ice Lance: Deadly Shards affect only hostile targets.
* Fixed a bug in Frost Armor retaliatory effects, when the aggressor was 'None'.
* Fixed Discord secondary effects to work on Dwemer constructs, if caster has Master of the Mind.
* Improved effective accuracy of Meteor Shower.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-5-5
files.changelogHtml:
Several bug fixes, including:

* Tweaked inventory list for wandering vendor (Lokun).
* Increased Frost Armor rating at the 2nd and 3rd rank of Mage Armor, to match the perk description.
* Removed incorrect 'Hide in UI' flag from Mystic version of Hammer of Justice.
* Fixed stuck sound effect after casting Spectral Missiles.
* Fixed bug with Deathguard: Dark Growth getting 'stuck' on the character (hopefully).
* Reduced Seed of Life: Phytogenesis effect from 100% to 50%, for balance.
* Fixed grey face bug on vendors (hopefully).

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-0
files.changelogHtml:
Balance fixes:

* Healing Touch: base healing decreased to 5/sec, duration increased to 15 sec.
* Healing Touch: Nature's Touch amount decreased to 30-40, now affected by the Regeneration perk.
* Healing Touch: Cleansing now works on each tick.
* Wild Mushroom: base delay between explosions decreased to 3 sec.
* Veil of Nature: base effect decreased from 50% to 33%.
* Veil of Nature: Poison Sting now deals 6-9pt/sec. (+10% per spell level).
* Divine Armor: increased protection by 3% per affinity rank (up to 30% max)

New Spells:

Blessed Weapon (Conjuration Adept)

Summons an axe imbued with divine energy to fight for you for 60 sec.

* Purifying Flames: Each Blessed Weapon's attack sets the target on fire for 3 sec.
* Burn the Heresy: Human enemies take additional mana and stamina damage.
* Power of Faith: Blessed Weapon deals additional magic damage to unholy creatures equal to ten times your Divine Affinity.
* Light's Touch: Restores 2% of your maximum health per sec while Blessed Weapon is active.
* Sigil of Faith: Increases Blessed Weapon's damage by 1% per caster's level.
* Devoted Weapon: The Mystic Binding perk also increases Blessed Weapon damage by 50%.
* Blessing of the Nine: Each Blessed Weapon's attack has a chance to increase your Holy Bolt effectiveness by 50% for 10 sec.
* Triumph: Each Blessed Weapon's attack has a chance to decrease the target's armor by 100 for 10 sec.
* Avenging Wrath: Each Blessed Weapon's attack has a chance to apply Avenging Wrath effect for 10 sec. While this effect is active, increases your chance to score a critical strike by 15%.
* Light's Domination: If Blessed Weapon's target attacks you, knocks the target down. 10 sec cooldown.

Stormgate (Alteration Adept)

Creates a mystical portal at the caster's location for 60 sec. Upon pressing the hotkey (default: G), teleports the caster to the portal. There is a 10 sec. cooldown between translocations.

* Storm Shield: Grants you immunity to magic for 4 sec after translocation.
* Negation: Grants you immunity to physical damage for 4 sec after translocation.
* Swift Recharge: Healing spells cost nothing for 5 sec after translocation. Consumes a storm shard.
* Enhanced Mind: Electric spells cost nothing for 5 sec after translocation. Consumes a storm shard.
* Shocking Pulse: Briefly stuns anyone in the area you translocated from.
* Tempest Spawn: Spawns a magical beast at your current position. The spawn will fight for you for 10 sec, taunting all nearby enemies.
* Resonance: Causes your next Electric Charge to deal an additional 50% damage. Only works if cast within 5 sec after translocation.
* Annihilation: Electrocute does not require a storm shard to trigger, and works on targets with 35% health or less. Only works if cast within 5 sec after translocation.
* Equilibrium: On translocation, restores mana and stamina equal to 10% of your total amount of mana and stamina multiplied by your Storm Affinity. Consumes a storm shard.
* Straying Gateway: Pressing the hotkey within 5 sec after translocation, moves the stormgate to your initial position.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-1
files.changelogHtml: Fix a bug in the MCM for Pyromancer spells.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-2
files.changelogHtml:
Balance fixes:

* Divine Armor: cut Alteration experience gain in half.
* Divine Armor: fixed bug that reduced effect of shrine blessings and some perks.
* Divine Armor: Divine Vengeance effect reduced from 30% to 15%, to match the description.
* Added Ring of Retribution: increases effect of Divine Vengeance from 15% to 25%.
* Stormstrike: Static Drain damage reduced to match description, fix some overpowered cases.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-2 SkyRe Patch
files.fileName: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-2 SkyRe Patch-35339-1-6-2.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Balance fixes:

* Divine Armor: cut Alteration experience gain in half.
* Divine Armor: fixed bug that reduced effect of shrine blessings and some perks.
* Divine Armor: Divine Vengeance effect reduced from 30% to 15%, to match the description.
* Added Ring of Retribution: increases effect of Divine Vengeance from 15% to 25%.
* Stormstrike: Static Drain damage reduced to match description, fix some overpowered cases.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-3
files.changelogHtml:
Bug and balance fixes including:

* Fixed script to ignore Arcane Weapon hotkey while in text input menus.
* Arcane Weapon: Bloodthirst magnitude cut from the 15-40pt range to 12-25pt, for balance, and set the destruction experience multiplier to zero.
* Phantom Shroud: changed visual FX to GhostNewFXShader, for better look.
* Glacial Fortress: changed Recuperation effect to 400%, for balance.
* Frost Armor: fixed Icy Gale to no longer trigger when casting Invisbility or using the Become Ethereal shout, since it would negate their effects.
* Deathly Pall: increased duration of Enslave Spirit from 15 to 20 sec.
* Deathly Pall: fixed health damage from Enslave Spirit to match description.
* Deathly Pall: fixed Ghostly Form to only double incoming destruction effects, not perks, shrine blessings, etc.
* Phoenix Strike: changed implementation from self-targeting to aimed; it should now work on targets that are not actively hostile, and may work better with Requiem.
* Fixed race condition (hopefully!) in Salamander Touch, Earthbound Weapon, Frost Armor, Storm Armor.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-3 SkyRe Patch
files.fileName: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-3 SkyRe Patch-35339-1-6-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Bug and balance fixes including:

* Fixed script to ignore Arcane Weapon hotkey while in text input menus.
* Arcane Weapon: Bloodthirst magnitude cut from the 15-40pt range to 12-25pt, for balance, and set the destruction experience multiplier to zero.
* Phantom Shroud: changed visual FX to GhostNewFXShader, for better look.
* Glacial Fortress: changed Recuperation effect to 400%, for balance.
* Frost Armor: fixed Icy Gale to no longer trigger when casting Invisbility or using the Become Ethereal shout, since it would negate their effects.
* Deathly Pall: increased duration of Enslave Spirit from 15 to 20 sec.
* Deathly Pall: fixed health damage from Enslave Spirit to match description.
* Deathly Pall: fixed Ghostly Form to only double incoming destruction effects, not perks, shrine blessings, etc.
* Phoenix Strike: changed implementation from self-targeting to aimed; it should now work on targets that are not actively hostile, and may work better with Requiem.
* Fixed race condition (hopefully!) in Salamander Touch, Earthbound Weapon, Frost Armor, Storm Armor.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-4
files.changelogHtml:
Bug and balance fixes, including:

* Fixed stuck buffs in Hammer of Justice (another race condition bug)
* Fixed Band of Devastation enchantment, it was not working correctly.
* Fixed Divine Armor: Redemption, it was not applying damage correctly.
* Fixed Earthbound Weapon: Wild Growth to prevent repeated triggering with continuous attacks.
* Reduced chance that Winter Woe: Icy Ground will cause the character to be flung about.

files.name: Forgotten Magic Redone v1-6-5
files.changelogHtml:
Bug and balance fixes, including:

* Fixed Stormstrike: Refraction to prevent OnHit effects from stacking on continuous attacks.
* Fixed Frost Armor for the same reason.
* Fixed Divine Armor for the same reason.
* Fixed Storm Armor for the same reason.
* Fixed Healing Touch: Overgrowth for the same reason.
* Changed Blight Curse: Corrosion to cast once (on hit) rather than repeatedly.
* Fixed Spectral Missiles so that the target will not be alerted until 1st missile actually launched.
* Fixed some race conditions in Storm Armor that could lead to stuck buffs.
* Cut the Alteration experience for Storm Armor by 60% for balance.
* Fixed a race condition in Ancient Lich that could lead to stuck destruction buff.
* Fixed Phoenix Strike to ignore dead targets (to help avoid stuck visual effects).
* Fixed string caching bug that caused capitalization problems with translation variables (I hope).

And for bonus content, a new ring:

Revenant Ring: raises victims of Blight Curse (up to max level 25)
